nodes.text: Hyperpins were a type of object. When Jedi Padawan Anakin Skywalker fought B1-series battle droids in the Jedi Temple, he used the Force to knock the droids over like hyperpins.
Hyperpins were first mentioned in the canon junior novel Choose Your Destiny: An Obi-Wan & Anakin Adventure, which was written by Cavan Scott and published in 2019.
